item.description:
A wide variety of "working tools" are found in Wicca. Your effectiveness in ritual can be greatly enhanced by properly procuring and handling the right tools. They focus and refine the power within you. They are visual and manual aids and symbols to help in contacting the subconscious mind and persuading it to work the magick you desire. The success of magick is in the belief, emotion and discipline you bring to the ritual, tools can play an integral part of this success!.

Class begins at 6PM followed by Open Circle
item.name: Class & Open Circle - Tools and Supplies
